column1: #Text=Katara says : " How does that feel , dad ? "
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Everyone 's counting on me to lead this mission Katara , I wo n't let them down .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Ca n't you heal him any faster ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm doing everything I can .
#Text=" Katara says : " No offense Sokka , but you 're not exactly Mr. Healing Hands .
#Text=" Katara says : " Do n't be crazy Sokka .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Maybe I am a little crazy , but the eclipse is about to start and we need to be up that volcano by the time it does .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " You can do this .
#Text=" Katara says : " I still think you 're crazy , but I 'm proud of you too .
